nodes.title: About me
nodes.info1:
> I'm Shahid, 21 and currently pursuing an under graduate degree in Electrical and Electronics Engineering at MVSR(Telengana, India).
I am a professional freelance video editor and a content creator on Instagram and YouTube as well. I'm flexible and can edit videos ranging from simple vlogs to complex professional edits. 
I provide 1 FREE VIDEO EDIT to the client, if and only the client is satisfied we continue or else it would be a good learning opportunity for me. 

>I was born and raised in Saudi Arabia, where I spent 18 years of my life experiencing all I could during which I represented my school team in CBSE Nationals(Table Tennis) thrice which were held in India.
I love editing videos the most out of all the other things I enjoy such as vlogging, biking, playing Table Tennis, video games, spending time with friends. 
My goal is to do whatever makes me happy even if it's as simple as star gazing for the rest of my life because in the end happiness is all that matters. It is said that "money cant buy happiness" and it's true that money plays an important role in our life but what good is money when you are broken from within?  
I want to help people to realize what makes them truly happy and motivates them to keep moving forward.
